name: Gone 2 Race
overview: Gone 2 Race is a site dedicated to connect everyone who is involved is some type of racing and motorsports. This site is for the people and companies that associate themselves in any type of racing and motorsports whether it may be past, current, or future. Gone 2 Race wants to try to bring everyone in the racing and motorsports world together in once place. That being said Gone 2 Race hopes to build up a strong Marketplace section of the site where users can come to and find what they may need. Along with the Marketplace, the Forum section will be a great place for various discussions of all types racing while possibly learning at the same time. Of course the main purpose of the site is to bring people together and the companies that put their name out there on race day.
